name: Crossing Frontier 盡界戰線
description:
Crossing Frontier is a side-scroll action game with brawling elements, , featuring multiplayer PVP content and the thrilling combat . Players can preform spectacular combo with simple mechanic in game and just embrace the excitement and pleasure it brought to you. The unquie talent tree is the core system to build up your character with style and finess!

Friendly advice: Crossing Frontier Demo is for Steam Next Fest(2022/02/21-2022/02/28) only, if you are interested in it, don’t hesitate to add it in your wishlist!

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　

Talent Tree:
In Crossing Frontier, player can build shape their character into different playstyle by setting up with different path of Talent Tree. Character’s Talent Tree will be unlocked during the fight by leveling up. Assest the situation and adjust the Talent Tree accordingly is the key to victory!


Quemeau’s orginal ultimate: Armageddon

Quemeau’s ultimate variant 2: Cataclysm


Quemeau’s ultimate variant 3: Protostar

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　

Combo system:
In Crossing Frontier, each character has plenty of combos and skills which can be used in air, combine normal attack and skills leads to splendor combos!
